author: martin
msg: This patch completes the simplification recently enabled by introduction
of the CRLF macro.  ebcdic2ascii_strictly is renamed ebcdic2ascii;
os_toascii_strictly is renamed os_toascii.  The former loose conversion
functions are removed, and references suitably changed.
This changes nothing on ASCII machines, but removes the kludge to have two

author: rbb
msg: Fix the rest of the modules to work with the new APR stat structure.

author: rbb
msg: Fix mod_rewrite to work with the new APR stat structure.

author: rbb
msg: Next pass at the time functions.  This defines an ap_ansi_time_t which has
a specific format (seconds since 0:00:00 Jan 1, 1970).  I also renamed the
(get|set)_curtime functions to (get|set)ansitime.  This should make more
sense, and be a bit more intuitive.
